sub_title: Experienced Integration Engineer with the focus on identity and access management
summary: Gained more than enough experience in the role of technical application engineer throughout the years. Started out as a call center agent and via various roles and employers ended up with my current employer in the role of Systems Integration Engineer working with SAP PO/PI (7.5), Waveset IDM (v8), Sailpoint IdentityIQ (v7.02), EUR-API v2, Elastic & Kibana on Windows 10 Enterprise and RHEL 7. Resource in various projects like moving applications off premise into the cloud (Osiris, MS Exchange 2016), implementing MFA. Recently I have been assigned to change management aligning development and support changes using JIRA and TOPDesk.

education.field_of_study: NL, EN, DU, TK, EC, HA
NL, FRA, DU, ENG, GS, AK

profile_positions.title: Lead Business Operations

profile_positions.description:
Activities:

2nd and 3rd line technical support on SAP Process Orchestration /Process Integration (SAP PO/PI XI 7.5),

Support on Elastic Stack & Kibana,

profile_positions.title: System Integration Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- develop, test and support Vinzant GECS scheduling software on Windows server platform.
- support on Sybase, Oracle and MS SQL 2008/2012 database issues,
- support on Sybase Powerbuilder applications,
- support Markit EDM, IBM Ascential Datastage, MQ, (S)FTP and other means of communications,
- key contact for external parties in case of issues (Kasbank, Citibank),
- providing logging to regulators like AFM, DNB and external auditors like E&Y, PwC (SoX controls),
- participating in larger projects representing the batch team,
- coordinate activities and lead batch team (group of 4 FTE),
- report on system and team performance and system outages/downtime to user base and management,
- write and update procedures and process documentation regarding batch processing within Aegon Asset Management,
- work in rotating shifts to monitor batch processing,
- participate in new system implementations like MS SQL, Dimension to improve ETL data proccesing and storage,
- involvement in outsourcing technical positions to external IT-partner Syntel by training Syntel staff,
- Setting up test environment infrastructure including all applications and database for end-to-end connectivity testing.
- Delivering support on full cycle testing with Simcorp dimension
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Analyst Senior

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- develop, test and support on GECS scheduling software on Windows Server platform,
- support on MS SQL, Oracle and Sybase when database issues occur,
- support on Sybase Powerbuilder applications,
- support on IBM Datastage as the main ETL tool, Markit EDM, MQ, (S)FTP and other means of communication,
- support on Murex trading tool (for group Derivatives and Hedging) including UNIX-based scheduler support and file exchange system,
- key contact for external parties when data delivery issues occur (Citibank, Kasbank, FTS, Bloomberg, S&P),
- participate in large company-wide projects representing the IT-batch team,
- coordinate and lead batch team within Aegon Asset Management (3FTE),
- replace Head of IT during holidays, business trips,
- report on system downtime, team performance, process errors and incidents to management,
- write and update technical and functional documentation to reflect changes or new implementations,
- contact external vendors on licensing and support contracts, order licenses if required,
- work in rotating shifts to monitor batch processing,
- particpate in implementation of new systems, appplications like MS SQL, Dimension to improve data processing and storage,
- coordinate DR activities for Aegon Asset Management including annual testing,
- update data in external systems to support business actions while trading.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Analyst Medior

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- develop, test and support Sybase Remoteware middleware on Windows,
- develop, test and support Sun Java CAPS interfaces on UNIX,
- develop, test and support Seebeyond e*Gate interfaces on UNIX,
- write functional and technical specs for the above interfaces,
- hand over interface solutions to the Support team,
- document internal processes and interfaces and store in Livelink or Sharepoint,
- propose and build interface changes and updates,
- develop and support GSS 6.2 POS upgrade for all 214 retail stores in EMEA,
- 3rd level support on all Nike Supply Chain systems like IP on as400, GSS, Sybase Remoteware, Shoppertrak, Inventory Management, MS SQL 2005, Oracle 10G, Hyperion Essbase and Crystal store reports,
- deliver and support (S)FTP solutions between Nike and 3rd parties to transfer data (Edifice, Agentrics),
- lead smaller projects for B2B interface implementations,
- train support staff and work together on knowledgetransfer and map out structural issues,
- deliver support on sellthrough process,
- support on EDI-solutions with large retailers in EMEA.
profile_positions.title: Data & Integration Application Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- trace and resolve interface issues with SAP OM/MM, Siebel CRM and CDB,
- deliver reports from Oracle to sales and business-it consultants,
- deliver technical specifications and documentation, build new e*Gate interfaces between systems or update existing interfaces. Test changes in a non-production environment before going to ICOE-board for review.
- deliver EDI-mappings to new EDI-customers and test,
- deliver 3rd level support on all Nike Supply Chain systems like IP, GSS, Remoteware, Shoppertrak, Inventory Management, MS SQL server.
- deliver FTP-solutions between Nike and 3rd parties to transfer data (Edifice, Agentrics).
profile_positions.title: Data & Integration/Application Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- deliver 2nd and 3rd line support on Siebel eSales application,
- perform maintenance and monitor Siebel application servers,
- participate in new rollouts and updates for Siebel and associated applications at least once a year,
- trace bugs and rollout new SRF to bring new functionality to the Siebel application,
- trace and resolve interface issues with SAP MM/OM, Siebel CRM or CDB,
- deliver reports and build Oracle queries for sales/business it-consultants,
- present on IT to an audience of new hires.
profile_positions.title: Business Applications Support Engineer Nike Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- deliver 2nd line and 3rd line support for all Siebel CRM applications in Europe,
- deliver 2nd and 3rd line support for all reporting applications used in european offices (Oracle based mostly; otherwise MS Access and Informix),
- act as Siebel administrator for EMEA (on Siebel call center),
- implement, test and support Siebel eSales,
- maintain and implement new call centers in EMEA,
- administer two Aspect call centers (Leiden and Dublin). Acting backup for Aspect call center in Toronto.
- administer Active Directory in EMEA,
- implement and maintain Aspect middleware servers in EMEA, develop applications for Aspect middleware servers,
- QA and test Symantec's european websites,
- participate in Siebel CRM rollout in EMEA and Canada.
profile_positions.title: Business Application Support Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- back up team manager leading a team of 23 technical support agents,
- providing call versus case statistics to manager technical support EMEA,
- investigate product-specific bugs on all Windows platforms,
- monthly reports on Top 10 issues either by language or region,
- test IDSN-modems and analog devices for compatibility,
- work with development on product improvements,
- work with localization teams on localized software versions,
- point of contact for journalists and sales EMEA, participate in major product shows like CeBit,
- product training for new technical support staff,
- give group presentations to other departments,
- provide product training at external sites like Fujitsu Professional Services in Maarssen, Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: WinFax & pcAnywhere Product Lead EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
- deliver production support by phone, fax and e-mail on product-specific issues in Dutch, English and German,
- write technical documentation for Symantec knowledge base,
- maintain and update product FAQ's published regularly on intranet and internet.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Agent WinFax & pcAnywhere
